analysis.description:
CTT.tokenPerETH should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xf0ddd41ac68b71ecbad395aa6240c41c5b55c749.sol#60-61)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xf0ddd41ac68b71ecbad395aa6240c41c5b55c749.sol#33)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xf0ddd41ac68b71ecbad395aa6240c41c5b55c749.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0xf0ddd41ac68b71ecbad395aa6240c41c5b55c749.sol#1): it allows old versions
